overview: In the 1930s, once-great World War I pilot Roger Shumann performs as a daredevil barnstorming pilot at aerial stunt shows while his wife, LaVerne, works as a parachutist. When newspaper reporter Burke Devlin arrives to do a story on the Shumannsâ€™ act, he quickly falls in love with the beautiful--and neglected--LaVerne.
tagline: The Book They Said Could Never Be Filmed!
title: The Tarnished Angels
